titleStmt.title: The petition of the oppressed market people, humbly offer'd to the consideration of the Lord Mayor, Aldermen, and Common Council of the City of London
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing; latest internal date is 1698 [i.e. 1699].
A collection of documents relating to extortionate rates charged by the farmers of London market to stall holders.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
